title: Personal Blog is Finalized
body: I've implemented all the basic features I wanted on my blog, next I'll look into adding timestamps to the blog posts and maybe a markdown formatter, as well as a more inutitive way to write posts.

title: Getting AWS Certified
body: I've begun pursuing certifications from AWS, so first I'll become a Certified Cloud Practicioner. Afterwards, I'll begin preparing for either the AWS Developer Certification or the AWS Certified Solutions Architect.

title: Working On My Blog
body: I've begun implementing all the basic requirements for my blog, so it felt fitting to make my first post.
